trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una composizione durante gli eventi d’immissione del testo in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà è un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> quando l'utente immette il testo in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> utilizzando un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] e <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> evento si verifica.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> è la classe di base <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> classe definisce le proprietà che restituiscono <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> oggetti per indicare la posizione della composizione del testo.

trans-unit.source: When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente immette il testo in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> è un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.

trans-unit.source: Finalizes the composition.
trans-unit.target: Completa la composizione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la lunghezza della composizione corrente in simboli Unicode.

trans-unit.source: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Lunghezza della composizione corrente in simboli Unicode.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> proprietà indica il numero di caratteri immessa dopo l'ultimo <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è significativa solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> evento si verifica, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> ,-1 e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> proprietà indica la lunghezza della composizione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Versioni e dipendenze](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione in cui si verifica la composizione del testo nell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.

trans-unit.source: The position at which the composition text occurs in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui si verifica la composizione del testo nell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è significativa solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> evento si verifica, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> ,-1 e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> proprietà indica la posizione del testo di composizione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionOffset%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionOffset%2A> è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Versioni e dipendenze](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la lunghezza del testo finalizzato in simboli Unicode, quando si verifica l’evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" />.

trans-unit.source: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Lunghezza del testo finalizzato in simboli Unicode, quando si verifica l’evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> evento si verifica, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> è -1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Versioni e dipendenze](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l’offset del testo finalizzato quando si verifica l’evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" />.

trans-unit.source: The offset of the finalized text when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Offset del testo finalizzato quando si verifica l’evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> evento si verifica, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> è -1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Versioni e dipendenze](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
